## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> delete by default for iplist and ilist.

Specialize this to get different behaviour for ownership-related API. (If you really want ownership semantics, consider using std::list or building something like <em><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af7dca6236dc4685d19780a150377258d">BumpPtrList</a></em>.)
